ABSTRACT This article discusses in detail the drugs used to prevent chronic kidney disease and the diseases that result from them. Chronic kidney disease is developing rapidly today, and short-term treatments are being found in medicine. KEYWORDS Chronic kidney disease, diagnosis, transplant, glomerular filtration rate. If you can find a living kidney donor, you may not need to start dialysis at all. It is possible to have a transplant when your kidneys are getting close to failure.
